thread.title: Pay What You Want for a Collection of Make's Raspberry Pi and Arduino Books
thread.title_full: Pay What You Want for a Collection of Make's Raspberry Pi and Arduino Books

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Pay What You Want for a Collection of Make's Raspberry Pi and Arduino Books
text:
The Humble Book Bundle has teamed up with Make to collect together a ton of books for learning how to use an Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Advertisement 
The collection runs the gamut of beginners guides and more advanced tutorials. If you’re just starting out, Basic Arduino Projects , Getting Started with the Internet Things , and Getting Started with the Adafruit Flora are all great. For more advanced users, Getting Started with Sensors , Raspberry Pi and AVR Projects , and Arduino Bots and Gadgets are all worthwhile. If you’ve been itching to get into some DIY electronics, the bundle’s packed with everything you’ll need. Head over to Humble Bundle for the full list of books.
